divs: Sighting DetailsVideoing at the Monterey Bay beach again, clear skys for 15-20 miles. with in the first 2-3 mintunes after setting up the video trypod this white light that look like just another star as I'm looking south it was moving so I begain to video it as it moved north along the shor line. I tryed to zoom in a few times but not able to make out any out line like a airplane,etc..it just keep on moveing slow it seem to stop a few times. the video time shows this went on for about 6 mintunes long..it was very cool to watch this go on....This makes about the 5th one I have videoed them in the past few mounths and have info the Mufon about this...maybe we can but all of this together for the public to see...after there review.etc. Note-- large earth quakes around the world in the past mouths and maybe related?..not sure but the timeing is odd.....
Summary: At the beach night videoing this white light coming from the SW moving slow going N --NE
